newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Six die in Bogota bar brawl.
newsitem.headline: Six die in Bogota bar brawl.

text.p: Six people were killed and five injured in a drunken bar brawl in a southwestern suburb of Bogota during the night, police said on Monday.

The fight broke out at a bar in a working class neighbourhood of Soacha shortly before midnight (0500 GMT) when 10 men walked in and tried to dance with the girlfriends of another group of men, a police spokesman said.
"A fight broke out between two men and then the whole thing got out of control. It was basically a drunken fight in which six men died and five other people were injured," he said.
The victims, who were shot or stabbed to death, were aged between 19 and 38. One of the injured was a 20-year-old woman.
